physicalTable.name: SAMP_EMPL_PARENT_CHILD_MAP
physicalTable.description: Employee Parent Child Map: Stores the employee parent child information in a specific format that is required to create parent-child hierarchies within OBIEE. For every employee, it stores the complete hierarchical path upto the root node.

physicalColumns.name: Is_Leaf
physicalColumns.description: Is Leaf: Flag to indicate if a member is leaf or not. Possible values are 1 or 0.

physicalColumns.name: Ancestor_Key
physicalColumns.description: Ancestor Key: Stores the parent information as an integer

physicalColumns.name: Member_Key
physicalColumns.description: Member Key: Stores the member key information as an integer

physicalColumns.name: Distance
physicalColumns.description: Distance: Stores the distance between the employee and it's ancestor. The ancestor could be the immediate parent or any other parent up in the hierarchy.
